short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay on top of project costs and profitability with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Planyard is a cloud-based budget tracking and project management software. It is mostly used for managing big construction projects and events.

This extensions adds a button to your browser toolbar. Use that button to upload files such as expense documents and contracts to your Planyard projects without having to open a new tab.

It's especially useful for web email clients such Gmail and Outlook.com. If someone sends, for example, an invoice to you via email, you can download it and upload it to Planyard using this extension in the same browser tab.

Learn more about Planyard and how to stay on top of project costs here: https://www.planyard.com
